comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] Quasymody you're fantastic! So it IS the Pittwater Regatta! And check it out, I thought I recognised the image of women rowing that appears at the top of the newspaper article. Did you read the article about the Highland Society on the next page? Very nearly as interesting as the regatta ;)
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] Great work! I thought I'd seen the pic of Mrs Wilson and Miss Hastie somewhere else but couldn't for the life of me remember where...discovered whilst drawing blanks looking for pics of Colonel Spain!

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] Haha another discovery while looking for something else, I expect Colonel Spain will turn up right when you don't expect him too ;) All the images in the article you found appear to be Hall ones, the others I haven't put on Flickr yet but they are now linked to the article in our records. A most productive find by Quasymody!
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
